$Ray Grimes juggled the throw and the Giants claimed that he was not holding the ball as Jess Barnes passed over the bag; the Giants gathered around 1B umpire Paul Sentelle; meanwhile the crowd in the bleachers rushed on the field and the game was held up for several minutes until the fans got to the shelter of the grandstand; the Giants appealed Sentelle's decision to HP umpire Bill Klem who reversed it, ruling Barnes safe; at this the Cubs set up such a roar that Klem held up the game to warn them to be quiet; fans threw cushions were hurled at Klem

$Gene Lansing called for interference with Charlie Hollocher's throw to 1B
